mapper.select: SELECT a.wiki_id as wikiId, a.member_id as memberId, b.title, b.menu_id as menuId, (select name from wiki_menu where id = b.menu_id) as menuName, a.register_time as date FROM wiki_like a, wiki b where a.wiki_id = b.id and a.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.register_time desc LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM wiki_like where member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT count(1) FROM wiki_like where member_id = #{memberId}
